name: Quick Maths (pupodunn)
description:
The Robots that were suppose to clean up the Earth mess is trying to make you take responsibility!  

Stop the robots from getting to you by solving quick and simple math problems on their heads.  

Instructions: 

  1.  Type the number that matches the equation on a robots head
  2.  Hit enter to Fire the number
  3.  Repeat and get a high score

Source Code: https://github.com/DunnOriginal/quickMaths 

This is my first published game ever! I would love to get some feedback!

Thanks to those who made the assets that I used for this game

  • Thanks aztrakatze for the cute Robot PNG https://aztrakatze.itch.io/simple-cute-robot
  • Thanks SubspaceAudio for the awsome space music   https://opengameart.org/content/5-chiptunes-action
